variable.name: HOSP2Y
variable.comment: Have you been hospitalized overnight at any time during the past two years? Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: GLAUCOMA
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Glaucoma Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: CATARACT
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Cataract(s) Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: HICHOLRP
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) High cholesterol requiring pills Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: ASTHMA
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Asthma

variable.name: EMPHYSEM
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Emphysema or chronic bronchitis Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: KIDNEYST
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Kidney or bladder stones (renal or urinary calculi) Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: HIBLDCA
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) High blood calcium Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: STOMULCR
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Stomach or duodenal ulcer

variable.name: DIVERTIC
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Diverticulitis Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: COLITIS
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease

variable.name: LUPUS
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Systemic erythematosus ('lupus' or SLE)

variable.name: PANCREAT
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Pancreatitis (inflamed pancreas)

variable.name: OSTEOPOR
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Osteoporosis (weak, thin, or brittle bones)

variable.name: HIPREP
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Hip replacement Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: OTHJREP
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Other joint replacement Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: INTESTRM
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Part of intestines taken out

variable.name: MIGRAINE
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Migraine headaches Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: ALZHEIM
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Alzheimer's disease Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: MS
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Multiple sclerosis Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: PARKINS
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Parkinson's disease Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: ALS
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, motor neuron disease, or Lou Gehrig's disease) Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: NACOND
variable.description: None of listed medical conditions ever
variable.comment: Has a doctor told you that you have any of the following conditions or have you had any of the following procedures? (Please mark all that apply.) None of the above Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: CVD
variable.comment: Has a doctor ever told you that you had heart problems, problems with your blood circulation, or blood clots? Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: CARDREST
variable.comment: Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Cardiac arrest (where your heart stopped and needed to be restarted) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.

variable.name: CHF_F30
variable.comment:
Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Heart failure or congestive heart failure Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: CARDCATH
variable.comment: Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Cardiac catheterization (heart catheterization or coronary angiogram) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.

variable.name: CABG
variable.comment: Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Heart bypass operation or coronary bypass surgery for blocked or clogged arteries in you heart Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.

variable.name: PTCA
variable.comment: Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Angioplasty of the coronary arteries (opening the arteries of the heart with a balloon or other device, sometimes called a PTCA) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.

variable.name: CAROTID
variable.comment: Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Carotid endarterectomy or carotid angioplasty (operation for blockage or narrowing of the arteries in your neck) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.

variable.name: ATRIALFB
variable.comment: Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Atrial fibrillation (a type of irregular heart beat) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.

variable.name: AORTICAN
variable.comment: Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. Aortic aneurysm Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.

variable.name: NACVD
variable.description: None of the listed CVD conditions ever
variable.comment:
Please mark the conditions or procedures below that a doctor said you had. None of the above Sub-question of F30 V3 Q3 'Heart or circulation problems'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: ARTHRIT
variable.comment: Did your doctor ever say that you had arthritis?

variable.name: RHEUMAT
variable.comment:
What type of arthritis do you have? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q4 'Arthritis ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: GALLBS
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had gallbladder disease or gallstones?

variable.name: GALLBSNW
variable.comment: Do you now have gallbladder disease or gallstones? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q5 'Gallbladder disease/gallstones'.

variable.name: GALLSTRM
variable.comment: Did you ever have a procedure to remove gallstones? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q5 'Gallbladder disease/gallstones'.

variable.name: GALLBLRM
variable.comment: Did you have your gallbladder removed? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q5 'Gallbladder disease/gallstones'.

variable.name: THYROID
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had a thyroid gland problem (not including thyroid cancer)?

variable.name: GOITER
variable.comment:
Do you have any of the following conditions? (Please mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each condition.) Goiter (large thyroid gland) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: GOITERNW
variable.comment:
If yes do you now have this problem? Goiter (large thyroid gland) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6.1.1 'Goiter ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: NODULE
variable.comment:
Do you have any of the following conditions? (Please mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each condition.) Nodule (lumps in the thyroid gland) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: NODULENW
variable.comment:
If yes do you now have this problem? Nodule (lumps in the thyroid gland) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6.1.2 'Nodule ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: OVRTHY
variable.comment:
Do you have any of the following conditions? (Please mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each condition.) Overactive thyroid Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: OVRTHYNW
variable.comment:
If yes do you now have this problem? Overactive thyroid Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6.1.3 'Overactive thyroid ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: UNDTHY
variable.comment:
Do you have any of the following conditions? (Please mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each condition.) Underactive thyroid Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: UNDTHYNW
variable.comment:
If yes do you now have this problem? Underactive thyroid Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6 'Thyroid gland problem ever'.
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q6.1.4 'Underactive thyroid ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: HYPT
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had hypertension or high blood pressure? (Do not include high blood pressure that you had only when you were pregnant.)

variable.name: HYPTAGE
variable.comment: How old were you when you were told you had high blood pressure? (Give your best guess.) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q7 'Hypertension'.

variable.name: HYPTPILL
variable.comment: Did you ever take pills for high blood pressure?

variable.name: HYPTPILN
variable.comment:
Do you now take pills for high blood pressure? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q7 'Hypertension'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: ANGINA
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had angina (chest pains from a heart problem)?

variable.name: ANGNPILN
variable.comment: Do you now take pills for angina? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q8 'Angina'.

variable.name: PAD
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had claudication or peripheral arterial disease (poor blood flow to the legs or blocked or narrowed arteries to the legs)? Do not include varicose veins or phlebitis.

variable.name: PADANGGR
variable.comment:
For the above condition, have you ever had: Angiography (dye in the arteries of the legs)? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q9 'Peripheral arterial disease'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: PADANGP
variable.comment:
For the above condition, have you ever had: Angioplasty (balloon catheter to open blockage)? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q9 'Peripheral arterial disease'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: PADSURG
variable.description: Surgery to improve flow to legs for PAD
variable.comment:
For the above condition, have you ever had: Surgery to improve blood flow in your legs (do not include surgery for varicose veins)? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q9 'Peripheral arterial disease'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: COLNSCPY
variable.comment: Have you ever had a colonoscopy or sigmoidoscopy or flex sig (where a doctor inserts a tube in the rectum to check for bowel problems)? Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: COLNSCDT
variable.comment:
When was the last test? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q10 'Colonscopy or sigmoidoscopy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: PCOLONRM
variable.comment:
Did you ever have any polyps of the colon, intestine, bowel, or rectum removed? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q10 'Colonscopy or sigmoidoscopy'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: HEMOCCUL
variable.comment: Have you ever given a sample of your stool (BM, bowel movement, or feces) to be checked or had a rectal stool exam by a doctor or nurse? This is sometimes called a stool guaiac or hemoccult test. Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: HEMOCCDT
variable.comment:
When was the last test? Sub-question of F30 V3 Q11 'Rectal stool exam ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: CANC_F30
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had cancer, a malignant growth, or tumor? (This does not include 'fibroids' of the uterus.)

variable.name: BRCA_F30
variable.comment: What kind of cancer did you have? (Mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each type of cancer.) Breast Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BRCA55
variable.comment:
How old were you when a doctor first told you that you had this cancer. Breast Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12.1.1 'Cancer - breast'.
Not collected on all versions of form 30.

variable.name: COLN_F30
variable.comment: What kind of cancer did you have? (Mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each type of cancer.) Colon, rectum, bowel or intestine Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: COLOCA55
variable.comment:
How old were you when a doctor first told you that you had this cancer? Colon, rectum, bowel, or intestine Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12.1.4 'Cancer - colon, rectum'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: THYRCA
variable.comment: What kind of cancer did you have? (Mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each type of cancer.) Thyroid Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: THYRCA55
variable.comment:
How old were you when a doctor first told you that you had this cancer? Thyroid Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12.1.5 'Cancer - thyroid'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: CERVCA
variable.comment: What kind of cancer did you have? (Mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each type of cancer.) Cervix (opening to the uterus or womb) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: SKINCA
variable.comment: What kind of cancer did you have? (Mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each type of cancer.) Skin cancer (not melanoma) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MELN_F30
variable.comment: What kind of cancer did you have? (Mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each type of cancer.) Melanoma Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BLADCA
variable.comment: What kind of cancer did you have? (Mark 'No' or 'Yes' for each type of cancer.) Bladder Sub-question of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: OTHERCA
variable.comment: Had other cancer ever (e.g. ovarian, endometrial, brain, liver, lung, bone, stomach, blood, lymphoma, Hodgkins, or other). Sub-questions of F30 V3 Q12 'Cancer ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: NUMFALLS
variable.comment: During the past 12 months, how many times did you fall and land on the floor or ground?

variable.name: FAINTED
variable.comment: During the past 12 months, have you fainted, blacked out, passed out, or lost consciousness? Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKBONE
variable.comment: Did a doctor, nurse, or physician assistant ever say you had a broken, fractured, or crushed bone? Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKHIP
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Hip Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKHIP55
variable.description: Broke hip first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Hip Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.1 'Broke hip'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKBACK
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Spine or back (vertebra) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKBACK55
variable.description: Broke spine first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Spine or back (vertebra) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.2 'Broke back or spine'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKUARM
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Upper arm (humerus) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKUARM55
variable.description: Broke upper arm first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Upper arm (humerus) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.3 'Broke upper arm'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKLARM
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Lower arm or wrist Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKLARM55
variable.description: Broke lower arm first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Lower arm or wrist Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.4 'Broke lower arm or wrist'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKHAND
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Hand (not finger) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKHAND55
variable.description: Broke hand first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Hand (not finger) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.5 'Broke hand'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKLLEG
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Lower leg or ankle Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKLLEG55
variable.description: Broke lower leg first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Lower leg or ankle Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.6 'Broke lower leg or ankle'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKFOOT
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Foot (not toe) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKFOOT55
variable.description: Broke foot first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Foot (not toe) Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.7 'Broke foot'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKOTHB
variable.comment:
Which bone(s) did you break and how old were you when the bone(s) first broke? (Please mark all that apply. If you don't know the exact age, please guess as close as you can.) Other (Specify): Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: BKOTHB55
variable.description: Broke other bone first time 55 or older
variable.comment:
How old were you when you first broke this bone? Other (Specify): Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15 'Broke bone ever' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Sub-question of F30 V3 Q15.1.8 'Broke other bone' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Not collected on all versions of Form 30.

variable.name: HTNTRT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 30, questions 7, 7.2, and 7.3. Three category variable on history of hypertension including information on current treatment. The three groups are never, currently untreated and currently treated hypertensive.

variable.name: HIP55
variable.comment: Computed from Form 30, questions 15.1 and 15.2. Indicator of whether participant has had a hip fracture at age 55 or older. Set to missing if age at screening is less than 55.

variable.name: FRACT55
variable.comment: Computed from Form 30, questions 15, 15.1 and 15.2. Indicator of whether the participant has ever broken a bone for the first time at age 55 or older.

variable.name: REVASC
variable.comment: Computed from Form 30, questions 3.1.4 and 3.1.5. Indicator for whether the participant has a history of either CABG or PTCA.
